const React = require("react"); class Help extends React.Component { render() { return (

Alright, time to finish your to-do list, improve your grades, and keep up with your workouts! With this tool, you can log your progress. Try replacing 'help' with these:

    To-do List Routes:

  • 'todolist'
  • 'modifyList'
  • 'downloadButton'

    • Grades Routes:

  • 'grades'
  • 'addGrades'
  • 'changeGrades'

    • Workouts Routes:

  • 'workouts'
  • 'addWorkouts'
  • 'changeWorkouts'

Finishing the whole list will earn you a surprise!

); } } module.exports = Help;

const React = require("react"); class ModifyWorkouts extends React.Component { render() { const workoutsData = this.props.workoutsData; return (
    {workoutsData.map((workout) => (
  • {workout.completed ? ( {workout.workout_name}: Currently completed{" "} {workout.currently_completed} reps : Current Best of{" "} {workout.current_best} reps : Completed{" "} ) : ( <> {workout.workout_name}: Currently completed{" "} {workout.currently_completed} reps : Current Best of{" "} {workout.current_best} reps : Incomplete{" "} )}
    • ))}

PUT Form - Update existing workout




POST Form - Add a new workout




DELETE Form - Delete existing workout


{" "}
); } } module.exports = ModifyWorkouts;
